scripts.dev: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); res.end(fs.readFileSync('./valentines-card.html')); }); server.listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running on http://localhost:3000'));"
scripts.start: node -e "const http = require('http'); const fs = require('fs'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); res.end(fs.readFileSync('./valentines-card.html')); }); server.listen(process.env.PORT || 3000);"
